title: Ham cloak

properties.value: The ham cloak is part of the H.A.M. robes uniform worn by Humans Against Monsters members. It is obtained from pickpocketing H.A.M. members or dropped by H.A.M. guards. When worn, players are slightly less likely to be kicked out of the H.A.M. Hideout when pickpocketing H.A.M. members, this increases the more pieces the player wears. Wearing this will not increase players chances of successfully pickpocketing.[1]

Item ID4304

The ham cloak is part of the H.A.M. robes uniform worn by Humans Against Monsters members. It is obtained from pickpocketing H.A.M. members or dropped by H.A.M. guards. When worn, players are slightly less likely to be kicked out of the H.A.M. Hideout when pickpocketing H.A.M. members, this increases the more pieces the player wears. Wearing this will not increase players chances of successfully pickpocketing.[1]

It is also used in the quest Death to the Dorgeshuun.

[[File:Ham cloak detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''ham cloak''' is part of the [[H.A.M. robes]] uniform worn by [[Humans Against Monsters]] members. It is obtained from [[Thieving|pickpocketing]] [[H.A.M. members]] or dropped by [[H.A.M. guards]]. When worn, players are slightly less likely to be kicked out of the [[H.A.M. Hideout]] when pickpocketing H.A.M. members, this increases the more pieces the player wears. Wearing this will not increase players chances of successfully pickpocketing.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/751400357473947648|date=8 July 2016|archiveurl=https://archive.is/xoE62|archivedate=20 December 2019|quote=HAM kit doesn't reduce getting caught, but each piece makes you slightly less likely to be ejected after being caught.}}

It is also used in the quest [[Death to the Dorgeshuun]].
